DataGroupDefinition.Name: Kinetic models
DataGroupDefinition.Description: Kinetic models are specified as kinetic model instances that contain parameter specifications of built in kinetic models or as simple absorption factors.

DataFormat.Name: Kinetic absorption data format
DataFormat.Description: The kinetic absorption factor data format specifies absorption factors.

DataFormat.Name: Kinetic conversion data format
DataFormat.Description: The kinetic conversion factor data format specifies conversion factors.
